text:
Ayyy fam shit’s gettin’ lit, we hirin’ folks so get over here and let’s make it rainnnn:

*Position:* Android ( Jr.  / Mid. ), iOS( Jr. / Mid.  ), Ruby( Señor), Interns for areas they like
*Location:* Zagreb, Croatia, no remote currently ( next year possibly remote/berlin )
*Who?*: smh if u don’t know this already. We're a startup called Superpopcorn, our app is a movie streaming guide, with cinema schedules and tickets for all new releases. iOS app got featured like ton of times already, most recently in UK, was also best of may, Android app has been featured for the last month in german play store and still remains in new and updated. But also something big is happening so we need reinforcements to handle the scale :eyes: 
*Perks:* Working with me, beer, all that classic startup kitchen stuff and all the general startup world perks like flexible working hours/days, conferences, partial remote, probably "20% time” starting in the next few months, listening to me preach about kanye west, lightsabers and idk what else. We go to movies, watch GoT and SV, watch soccer games, throw parties… eh idk all the usual.
*Are you using fragments?* : Yeah unfortunately
*What’s the stack?*: Retrofit 2, Dagger 2, Rx Magic, MVP, a part of app is written in kotlin, CI and CD set up

_PS We may be hiring bot developers by the end of the year_
Hit me up on email or slide in my DM’s here.
:beers:

>something big is happening so we need reinforcements to handle the scale

Facebook would like to have a word with you

text: <@U061HDV96|andreasbackx> pinned a message to this channel.
hmm... does pinning something let you view the message once it's beyond our message limit? my initial tests are saying no :confused:
i can see a preview of what's pinned, but clicking old ones doesn't let you view it
the previews are good anyway, just didn't realize it worked that way

Hey all, Lumosity is hiring as well.
*Position:* Sr. Android Developer, Sr. Visual Designer, Sr. UX Designer
*Location:* San Francisco, CA
Feel free to reach out to me or apply here: <https://jobs.lever.co/lumosity>
<@U0546QERR>: probably not, but it's more convenient for people looking for a job.
not sure if we’ll be hiring bot devs, but if we do, you’re first on my list <@U08GFT5V5> :kissing_heart:
